title: mobevent
description: Controls what mob events are allowed to run.

fields.title: event
fields.description: Required. An `enum` that specifies the events to control or query. Must be one of the following: `minecraft:ender_dragon_event`, `minecraft:pillager_patrols_event`, `minecraft:wandering_trader_event`, or `events_enabled`.

fields.title: value
fields.description: Optional. A `Boolean` that enables events (`true`) or disables them (`false`). Default: `false`.

overloads.title: Mob event
overloads.description: Call a `mob event` with an optional `Boolean` `value` to enable or disable the event.
